segments.text: Yes , miss . What was the problem with your purchase ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: These pajamas don't fit right . They're too long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to have them altered ? Or would you like a different size ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I want my money back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , but this was on sale , so I can only give you store credit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . Here's my receipt . I'd better be able to use this anywhere in the store .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course ... here you are . I'm sorry the pajamas didn't work out for you .
segments.speaker: S2
